title: Petr Čech
summary: Petr Čech[4] (Czech pronunciation: [ˈpɛtr̩ ˈtʃɛx] (listen); born 20 May 1982) is a Czech former professional footballer who is a technical and performance advisor for English club Chelsea. He also plays semi-professional ice hockey as a goaltender for Guildford Phoenix. Described by numerous players, pundits and managers as one of the greatest goalkeepers in history,[nb 1] he is argued, alongside Peter Schmeichel, to be the greatest goalkeeper in Premier League history.[nb 2]
